# PHENO

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
df <- read_table('PHENO', col_names = FALSE) %>% 
  set_names(c('ID','TIME','AMT','BWT','APGA','DV','MDV','EVID')) %>% 
  filter(DV != '.') %>% 
  mutate(DV = as.numeric(DV))
head(df)
ggplot(df, aes(x=TIME, y=DV, group=ID, color=ID)) +
  geom_point()+
  geom_line()
```
